channel.title: G-Man in Apprehension
channel.description:
I reached Apprehension, and I spotted the G-Man at the usual place (after climbing out of the leechless water) Waited a few seconds and he turned to the left to walk away, but after like 2 steps <paff> he vanished while clearly in the line of sight.
I don't know if this is a new bug or an old one, but still...

item.title: G-Man in Apprehension
item.dc:creator: Vortexyz
item.description:
yep, confirming I’m seeing this too (sorry, 7 months after OP). I definitely remember this did not occur in earlier builds, so it must be a new (well…new-ish) bug.

Read full topic
